awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: A journalist interviews an old woman who was forced into prostitution, just like many other Japanese women working in Asia outside of Japan during the first half of the 20th century. She worked in a Malaysian brothel called Sandakan 8.

title: Sandakan 8
